description: A Moose role for processing command line options

dependencies.name: perl
dependencies.description:
Perl 5 is a highly capable, feature-rich programming language with over
27 years of development.

dependencies.description: Module::Build::Tiny - A tiny replacement for Module::Build

dependencies.name: perl-moose

dependencies.name: perl-namespace-autoclean
dependencies.description: Namespace::Autoclean - Keep imports out of your namespace

dependencies.name: perl-path-tiny
dependencies.description:
This module provides a small, fast utility for working with file paths.
It is friendlier to use than File::Spec and provides easy access to
functions from several other core file handling modules. It aims to be
smaller and faster than many alternatives on CPAN, while helping people
do many common things in consistent and less error-prone ways.

dependencies.name: perl-test-fatal
dependencies.description: Incredibly simple helpers for testing code with exceptions

dependencies.name: perl-test-needs
dependencies.description: Skip tests when modules not available.

dependencies.name: perl-test-trap
dependencies.description: Trap exit codes, exceptions, output, etc.

dependencies.name: perl-test-warnings
dependencies.description: Test for warnings and the lack of them

dependencies.name: perl-try-tiny
dependencies.description: Minimal try/catch with proper preservation of $@
